amendment.description: Amendment modifies the definition of "optimum yield" in order to prohibit regional fishery management councils from allowing a fish stock to be harvested at a rate that exceeds the maximum sustainable yield for that fishery.
amendment.purpose: An amendment not preprinted in the Congressional Record to modify the Magnuson Act definition of "optimum yield" in order to prohibit regional fishery management councils from allowing a fish stock to be harvested at a rate that exceeds the maximum sustainable yield for that fishery.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gilchrest amendment (A009) Agreed to by recorded vote: 304 - 113 (Roll no. 718).
